From: Robert Kuhn i ST Sent: 4/8/2017 6:28:05 AM To: jeffrey E. [jeevacation@gmail.com] Subject: Re: Kuhn - The Science of Sleep and Dreams Importance: — High Just arrived NY, here for ~10 days. Now with the Trump-Xi Summit over (utterly overwhelmed by Syria strike), back to Closer To Truth. When good to meet? Robert On Mar 23, 2017, at 4:23 PM, jeffrey E. wrote: Look forward to seeing you On Thu, Mar 23, 2017 at 3:54 PM Robert Kuhn

wrote: 501 (c) (3) - private operating foundation - The Kuhn Foundation, which I set up in 1999 to support Closer To Truth. IRS letter attached. Thank you. On Feb 15, 2017, at 4:17 PM, jeffrey E. wrote: is ita charity that received the funding? On Wed, Feb 15, 2017 at 1:27 AM, Robert Lawrence Kuhn
